name: Runes of Magic
notes:
Game is playable, mouse is flickering but its not game breaking.
If mouse is invisible try window mode. 
In Game store doesn't work.

task.description: Please don't change default game install path .
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- rom_installer: http://dl.rom.gameforge.com/rom/client/RunesOfMagic_Setup.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Runes Of Magic/Client.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix/
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    description: Please don't change default game install path .
    executable: rom_installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
